Get AOI data

Source: R/peekbankr.R
get_aoi_data.Rd

Get AOI data

get_aoi_data(dataset_id = NULL, lab_dataset_id = NULL, age = NULL,
  connection = NULL)

Arguments

dataset_id

An integer vector of one or more dataset ids
lab_dataset_id

A character vector of one or more lab dataset ids
age

A numeric vector of a single age or a min age and max age (inclusive), in months
connection

A connection to the peekbank database

Value

A `tbl` of AOI data, filtered down by supplied arguments. If `connection` is supplied, the result remains a remote query, otherwise it is retrieved into a local tibble.

Examples

get_aoi_data(lab_dataset_id = "pomper_saffran_2016")
#> # A tibble: 226,809 x 23
#>    aoi_data_id aoi       t subject_id trial_id lab_trial_id distractor_image
